text: لَّهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ

translation.en.sahih: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.
translation.id.indonesian: Kepunyaan-Nya-lah kerajaan langit dan bumi. Dan kepada Allah-lah dikembalikan segala urusan.
